text.title: My Thoughts on Modern JavaScript
text.content:
# Modern JavaScript

JavaScript has evolved significantly over the years. Here are some key points:

- ES6+ features
- Async/await patterns
- Module systems
- Type safety with TypeScript

**Conclusion:** The ecosystem is more mature than ever.
